reviews.review:
Very nice experience, but the cheaters are still active sometimes! It s a worldwide problem, which is not present just in cs go, so that s life! :))
But overall, it s a game that keeps sticked to it and motivates you to become better with every game that you are playing!
So, for everyone, don t be toxic or rude, just enjoy your time and try to improve as much as you can!
